name: FadeFEHx2 - Vanilla
description:
FadeFEH built from the ground up for Reddit Redesign. Blends aspects of FadeFEH and ReFade.
For use on r/FireEmblemHeroes, more info there.

https://www.reddit.com/r/FireEmblemHeroes/comments/eacgda/fadefeh_a_visual_overhaul_for_rfireemblemheroes/
additional_info:
Jan-15-2020 (1.3)
• Removed watermark (which was causing SVG issues)
• Fixed newly added shadow boxes

Dec-28-2019 (1.2 Alpha)
• Fixed some bugs
• Removed some unnecessary !important ques.

Dec-17-2019 (1.1 Alpha)
• Added some new assets
• Directly going to a post from your feed should now render correctly
• Brightened some text

Dec-15-2019 (1.01 Alpha)
• Fixed a website issue

Dec-15-2019 (1.0 Alpha)
• Released
